attributes.action:
India blockage to Nepal
Humanitarian crisis in Nepal due to India blockage.
attributes.additional_details:
the guardian-
Nepal is facing a humanitarian crisis due to the blockade of its border posts with India by groups opposed to the new national constitution, according to the country’s deputy prime minister, Kamal Thapa.
CNN News-
"India's blockade is more inhumane than war," Nepal's Prime Minister, KP Sharma Oli, said on Friday.
The blockade started during the third week of September.
aljazeera news-
Landlocked Nepal is overwhelmingly reliant upon imports from India.
India Express - A step too far
attributes.background: Nepal is a independent country and has a right to make its own decision and no other country can interfere in its internal matter like wise India is trying to interfere in its constitution matter with the blockade on the border of Nepal and India. They can't do this to the landlocked country.
